bug.author: imransalam
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>URL(s) with the issue:</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/master/api_docs/python/tf/group>https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/master/api_docs/python/tf/group</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/control_flow_ops.py>https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/control_flow_ops.py</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Description of issue (what needs changing):</denchmark-h>
A clear description should be added and a proper usage example is to be added. <denchmark-h:h3>Clear description</denchmark-h>
For example: A group operations can run multiple operations at the same time, operations are not sequential and they will be executed when tf.group will be called. <denchmark-h:h3>Usage example</denchmark-h>
There is no usage example provided except for a link to where it's being used. <denchmark-h:h3>Submit a pull request?</denchmark-h>
Yes <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/29265>#29265</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: The documentation has been updated. Thanks! <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/group>https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/group</denchmark-link>
